name: EQ Bank
description: Equitable Bank is a Canadian bank founded in 1970. The bank provides residential and commercial real estate lending services. In 2013, it became a Schedule I Bank offering savings products. It is now Canadaâ€™s ninth largest independent bank, with more than $25 billion in assets under management.

partnerships.name: Temenos T24 Transact
partnerships.description: The challenger brand says the shift of its architecture to Microsoft Azure will reduce overheads and ready the bank for up-an-coming innovations in open Banking. The move is supported by long-term technology partner Temenos and will utilise the Swiss supplier's cloud-native T24 Transact product.
